column11: fever with joint pain reported from Village Kumbhkot, PHC
Chehat, District Kota. District RRT & Block health team

column10: investigated the outbreak. District RRT and Medical team from Government
Medical College, Kota visited the affected area. Teams consisting of doctors &
paramedical staff deputed in temporary medical camps. Cases treated with

column11: and Chloroquine. Out of 169 blood samples collected, 28

column10: samples were positive for Dengue by RD kit. Entomological survey in Block
Pyrethrum spray and fogging done. IEC done.

column11: fever, myalgia & arthralgia was reported from Village R.

column10: Kollapatti, SC Puliampatti, PHC, Guziliamparai, District Dindugul. All 23
blood smear samples were negative for malaria parasite. 2 serum samples were
positive for Dengue & 1 for Chikungunya. Anti-larval activities, fogging &
daily fever survey also done in the village. Health education imparted.
